context: Analyze this standing balance pose and identify comprehensive transition relationships. Dancer's Pose (Natarajasana) Standing backbend balance holding foot behind body. Consider the Balance, backbending, hip flexor stretch, focus. Analyze transitions that flow naturally from this pose and evaluate both immediate possibilities and progressive developments. Factor in modifications for different ability levels and the pose's role in creating balanced sequences.

practitioner.position: Standing backbend balance holding foot behind body
practitioner.primaryFocus: Balance, backbending, hip flexor stretch, focus

specificNeeds: Balance, backbending, hip flexor stretch, focus
